name: Spanky Gets Spooky!
description:
This project took me by surprise, because Bustina was meant to be my first released NES game.   However, I found this really cool tool at https://puzzle.nes.science and couldn't resist making a little something, infused as I was with the Halloween spirit. I had a lot of fun with it and highly recommend this tool.  I even left in the default music provided with it because it went so well with the game I was making!

So, here it is! My jack-in-the-box, popped up out of nowhere Halloween surprise baby - Spanky!  It's a 10 level mini sliding block, candy collecting type puzzle game about a wee ghost with the most serious unfinished business of all... CANDY.

he spooky.

It's very likely this one will receive lots of updates from me too, because I had a lot of fun working on the levels so far.

Sensitivity Warning: Although light-hearted, the story in this game contains mentions of the topic of missing children that could be a trigger to some. 

HAPPY HALLOWEEN!
